summary: John completed the API integration and will work on the payment gateway but is blocked by the lack of API keys. Sarah finished the frontend dashboard and will integrate with John's API endpoints. Mike had a client meeting where the design was approved and will work on the database schema. The team decided to use PostgreSQL instead of MySQL.
